description: Main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, defining the app's structure with a root widget, theme, and home page.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: StatelessWidget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: StatefulWidget that serves as the main page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State for MyHomePage, builds the UI with an AppBar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState widgets, constructing the widget tree.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage widget.
